title: Ravens-Bucs TNF Recap + Final thoughts for Week 8 (Friday Fun Show!)
itunes:title: Ravens-Bucs TNF Recap + Final thoughts for Week 8 (Friday Fun Show!)
description:
A virtual room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Gregg Rosenthal and Patrick Claybon share their final thoughts before a weekend of football action. First, we recap the Ravens-Buccaneers Thursday night matchup. Dan takes over "It's About Me!" with an ultimatum for Zach Wilson, Gregg Rosenthal gives us a final injury round-up including an update on Ja'Marr Chase, and finally we hit the last nuts and bolts leading into Week 8 with predictions for this weekend.

The Friday Fun Show airs live on YouTube at 10am PT/1pm ET/6pm BST every Friday.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
